title: 01/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Packers, head coaches, Lakers, Chiefs
itunes:title: 01/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Packers, head coaches, Lakers, Chiefs
description:
The Packers are the best team and Aaron Rodgers should win the MVP

Which new NFL HC hires will be a hit or a miss?

This Lakers team is very special

Some things that should worry the Chiefs this Sunday


Guest: Mark Schlereth
